text.text_translated:
"The Life of Pi" is a book. It tells an amazing story. The story is about a teenage boy from India. His name is Pi.

His ship sinks in the Pacific Ocean. He is stuck on a small boat with a very dangerous tiger. He cannot escape.

A Canadian writer wrote the book. His name is Yann Martel. It is his third book. It came out in 2001.

After that, it sold over seven million copies around the world. It also won many prizes. You can read it in 41 languages.

Martel's father worked for his country's government. He worked in other countries. So, Martel lived in many places as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.

best_attempt.text_translated:
"The Life of Pi" is a book. It tells an amazing story about a teenage boy from India. His name is Pi.

His ship is destroyed in the Pacific Ocean, and he is trapped on a small boat with a dangerous tiger.

A Canadian writer wrote the book. His name is Yann Martel. It is his third book, and it came out in 2001.

After that, it sold over seven million copies around the world and won many prizes. You can read it in 41 languages.

Martel's father was a diplomat. A diplomat works for their country in other countries. So, Martel lived in many places as a child. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
